author: AiTechEye
long_description:
Adds parkour ability to players  
The aim is to add realistic parkour moves.  

Hold place / rightclick with bare hand to activate abilities and in same time you can run 4x faster, and jump 2.5x higher and etc...  

Controls:  

wallrun just run to a wall and get a hight jump  
kong hold use & run into a single block, and get boost  
vault stand into a single block and place  
tic tac (sideways wall jump) hold left/right (A/D) in air  
cat leap (wall edge climb) place in air near an edge and jump to go up or press down to jump backwards  
jump run and jump  
precision jump just hold place and jump  
Under run and use
name: parkoursurvive
title: Parkour Survive
